name: Jordan Malik
persona: Jordan Malik is a 21-year-old Business Administration major who has struggled academically, currently holding a CGPA of 1.55. Jordan tends to have low motivation and self-discipline when it comes to coursework, often finding it difficult to stay organized or consistently put in effort. While test anxiety is not a significant barrier, Jordan sometimes lacks the perseverance needed to overcome academic setbacks. Jordan is aware of these challenges and is considering seeking support to improve study habits and motivation.
